text: De Película is a 24-hour cable television movie channel. It is owned by TelevisaUnivision under Televisa Networks. It is available in Mexico, the United States, and Latin America. This channel focuses on Mexican movies of all times that are under license of TelevisaUnivision. ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Television networks Category:Television channels in Mexico Category:1990 establishments
title: De Película
